snippet: Kaitlyn Gilliland of New York City Ballet had to retire at 24 because of major injuries, but at 27, she has found her way back and fallen in love with dance all over again.
abstract: Dancer Kaitlyn Gilliland, who was forced to retire from New York City Ballet due to multiple injuries, has started dancing again and will appear in dance-theater piece A Nutcracker: Part I at Knockdown Center in Flushing.
lead_paragraph: Kaitlyn Gilliland of New York City Ballet had to retire at 24 because of major injuries, but at 27, she has found her way back and fallen in love with dance all over again.

headline.main: Unbroken, Onstage, Trying a New Pace
headline.print_headline: Unbroken, Onstage, Trying a New Pace
